name: SUEZ Group
goal:
With 90 000 people on the five continents, SUEZ is a world leader in smart and sustainable resource management. We provide water and waste management solutions that enable cities and industries optimize their resource management and strengthen their environmental and economic performances, in line with regulatory standards. To meet increasing demands to overcome resource quality and scarcity challenges, SUEZ is fully engaged in the resource revolution.

With the full potential of digital
technologies and innovative solutions, the Group recovers 17 million tons of waste a year, produces 3.9 million tons of secondary raw materials and 7 TWh of local renewable energy. It also secures water resources, delivering wastewater treatment services to 58 million people and reusing 882 million m3 of wastewater. SUEZ generated total revenues of 15.9 billion euros in 2017 with Europe representing 69% of SUEZ's business.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Competition, Development, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, Humanitarian Aid, Internal Market, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives:
SUEZ follows :

- Circular economy package - Action Plan (REUSE, Plastics Strategy, Waste-to-Energy Communication, Interface, Monitoring framework) and Legislative proposals on Waste Directives (Waste, landfill, Packaging and Packaging Waste, WEEE/Batteries);
- 2030 climate & energy package – The Energy Union and Winter Package (Renewable Energy Directive);
- EU Drinking Water Directive;
- Evaluation of Waste Shipment Regulation;
- Evaluation of Urban Wastewater Treatment Directive and Water Framework Directive;
- Proposal for a Regulation on fertilising products (EC) No 2003/2003;
- Guidelines on the maximization of water reuse in the EU, and the setting of minimum quality requirements for water reuse for agriculture irrigation and aquifer recharge ;
- EU strategy on pharmaceuticals in the environment;
-Horizontal files: VAT Directive, PSI Directive, Concession and public procurement Directives
